channel.title: {help}Some Delta Questions Hard 1{/help} Please!
channel.description:
Please Someoen help me with this delta questions
1-How To make Donaters area???????
2-how to chance player's crowns for owner his own crown how??????
3-How to Chance Home teleport?????? the 1 in magic book please help
4-how to make monster's aggressive
5-how to make dclaws hit 4 times in delta?????????
6-how to make models???????? listen i edited my own dragon plate to yellow color and it was ready in metaseque after its ready in that what should i do in steps please tell me and how to extract it and put ints please!!

item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

item.title: {help}Some Delta Questions Hard 1{/help} Please!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“pureman222, post:1, topic:266738”]Please Someoen help me with this delta questions

1-How To make Donaters area???

2-how to chance player’s crowns for owner his own crown how???

3-How to Chance Home teleport??? the 1 in magic book please help

4-how to make monster’s aggressive

5-how to make dclaws hit 4 times in delta???

6-how to make models??? listen
i edited my own dragon plate to yellow color and it was ready in metaseque after its ready in that what should i do in steps please tell me and how to extract it and put ints please!![/quote]

  1. Create a command, then use an if statement. Create a variable for ‘donator’, and declare it.
  2. This is client sided, not sure how. Ask in the client hacking section.
  3. It’s in your clickingMost class.
  4. NPCHandler class.
  5. Use Google.
  6. Please use Google for this one.

wow theres 100s of tuts on this ffs.

item.title: {help}Some Delta Questions Hard 1{/help} Please!
item.dc:creator: @Hellz_Scape Hellz Scape
item.description:
@Hellz_Scape wrote:

  1. Not sure
  2. There is a Tut.
  3. Go to your Clickingmost.Java, search for
Case 73100

You should see this

case 73100: case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(####+misc.random(3),####+misc.random(3), 0); break;

Edit the numbers to your coords.

  1. There are tuts.

  2. You need to paste it into your clients folder called Models. Then you need to tell me the Model numbers and I’ll set up the INTs.

Read full topic
